column1: #Text=Tong says : " This is the crime scene .
#Text=And we know that the statue was built after Chin died .
#Text=" Katara says : " So if they were built at the same time , that means – " Sokka says : " Shhh !
#Text=That means Kyoshi never set foot in this temple !
#Text=" Katara says : " That 's a big hole in the mayor 's story , but it 's not enough to prove Aang 's innocence .
#Text=We need to go to Kyoshi Island .
#Text=" Katara says : " Where did you get that ?
